org.grapheditor.editor.graph
Class VertexInformation

java.lang.Object
  org.grapheditor.editor.graph.VertexInformation

public class VertexInformation
extends java.lang.Object

Ths class is used as vertex representation. It contains all information that is needed to display a vertex.

Author:
kjellw
